property.name: smhbase.nbits
property.description: On the client the values are being generated with a parameter of 63 bits. On the reality the SharemindDealer uses 64 bits. All of the values encrypted in SharemindSecret sharing must be between 0 and 2^(63)-1. But since the values generated use 64 bits, each server will also create a SharemindSharedSecret with the parameter of 64bits. Because every computation of the mod must be made on 64 bits.
